case.state: That eager to find out? I guess your curiosity will depend on how soon you can win a round against me...
”The Inventory”, right? Description checks out. Let's begin.
This place isn’t marked on any Federation maps… but it looks about what I expected.
So this is the "Inventory" I've heard of... doesn't look as secretive as I thought it would.
This must be the Inventory, alright. Doesn't look like any modern pub you'd find in Federation territory.
Huh... Look at that. Didn't know I had fans big enough to want to dress up like me.
What in the-? I'm trying to get a scan on her, but my visor's going haywire!
-The heck? This creature looks unlike anything in my database - and my visor's going crazy trying to bioanalyze her!
Huh... should I be expecting Master Hand or Mario to show up at some point, too?
Huh? I wasn't expecting to see you outside of Smash like this.
Well, look who it is. I'm going to have to ask you later how you found this place too.
Look at that... if I didn't know any better, I'd be tempted to ask if this is some kind of Smash reunion fest.
Well, just you wait a bit, Fina. Looks can be decieving, you know...
...Guess I should just leave it for now. Wonder if there's another way to get an analysis...
Hmm... Well, clearly it's not going to work right now. There's got to be a better way to learn about her...
Oh. There's someone on this planet who's already heard of me? I... wasn't expecting that.
...Really? We're going to play here, of all places?
...Seriously? What kind of exhibitionist do you take me for?
Huh... Did I come here when this place was having one of those "reniassance fairs" or something? Well, nevermind - let's play.
Is there a regular "medieval theme" in this place? Well, too late to change now - let's just begin.
A classroom? There's nothing sketchy going on with this place, right? Good.
Weird that a place like this would have a classroom... If there's anything sketchy here, there will be consequences later.
Just don't ask me to break any targets right now - I'm not in the mood.
This'll be an intersting change of pace for once - trying to strip each other down rather than beat each other up.
Heh... just don't expect me to go on you any easier than I usually do.
Interesting... all we need now is another Smash fighter to show up as the dealer.
Looks just about normal enough… guess I can relax a bit.
Alright, I’m down with some cards. Been a while.
Well, if I’m in the right place… time to start making use of my off time.
One’s all I need.
One. Thanks.
Good hand. Can afford to lose one of these, though.
I’ll grab two.
Taking two, dealer.
Two’s fine.
Mm. I’ll need three.
...Three.
It’ll just be three.
Right, I’ll take four.
Swapping out these four.
Yeah… I need four.
Hmph. Give me a new hand.
Shoot… think I’ll change the whole thing up.
Better change out all of them.
...Five.
Guess I'll go with ~cards.text~ more.
Sufficient.
...Yeah, I’m down with this.
No complaints here.
No guarantees… but I’ve got a good feeling about this.
Mm-hm.
Good by me.
Nothing to be disappointed about.
I like my chances with this.
Well then… here's hoping this nets me a victory.
Shame I can’t make any winnings from this. Been a while since my last big job, so I could use an extra cash bonus.
You know, I actually used to play poker quite a bit with some fellow hunters of mine. Not many of them are left, though...
I've seen lots of really nice planets over the years... just wish I could apreciate them more without most of them harboring death traps everywhere.
Alright, maybe this is the stroke of fortune I've been looking for.
Sorry, everyone... you're not going to take me out that easily.
Better have a good plan for your endgame. Too many people just think about short-term plans.
I've figured out out my plan for this... have you figured out yours?
Just what I was hoping for... couldn't have come at a better time.
Okay... you're on.
Don't worry - if you beat me here, it'll only be because you've earned it.
I don't like overconfidence... but I'll allow myself some optimism here.
Promising hand... now just to wait and see.
Hm.
Hell, I still got this.
If there’s one thing hunting’s taught me, sometimes no fortune is good fortune.
Last time I played something like this, I was still collecting regular bounties. Hadn't even heard of a Metroid.
I don’t mind losing… but you’re not going to win easily.
I have to say, it's interesting playing a game like this where we don't really have to hide how good we're doing.
Too late to second-guess now.
Still trying to get used to this place... civilized worlds the Federation hasn't discovered don't come around very often.
Didn't occur to me until now - I haven't even identified the planet we're currently on...
Ready whenever the rest of you are.
Fine hand. Just wish it was better right now.
It could go either way... though that's not really a thought I enjoy having on missions.
Hm... the lack of options you have in this game is really starting to hit me.
If I kept my suit, maybe I could've scanned my last cards for better options... actually, no.
I like being able to predict where things are going... which is to say, I don't like this.
Not exactly good… but I can’t call it bad, either.
Not much to do now but wait and see.
You hear all kinds of strange noises when alone on a mission. Creatures in the walls, corrosive lakes bubbling... and the snickering of smartasses that just beat me at poker.
Right. Am I supposed to be panicking over this?
Tch.
I think I know where this is going…
Doesn’t take much foresight to know how this’ll turn out…
"Easy come, easy go," as they say...
Hm. That's a drag.
Great... might as well just toss these in front of my plasma beam.
Yeah... not exactly filled with confidence right now.
Hm... this really isn't my game, huh.
Well, this could be worse. And probably will be.
Wonder if anyone around here would be willing to lend some tips if I do this again...
Misfortune's part of the game, after all... I've just been doing it a bit too much.
...So, anyone with a 7 high?
I like defying odds and all… but I think they’ve got me beat here.
Ugh… I’m up Phazon creek without a suit.
You don't say, Miku? Didn't realize I was famous even outside of Federation space.
I have, Miku. Typically in dangerous places, but their beauty makes them worth fighting for.
You're close. I'm a bounty hunter - the type of person they send when the space patrol finds a threat bigger than their pay grade.
Thankfuy not, Stocking. There's no evidence that ghosts even exist in Federation space... though a certain threat I found on Zebes almost fooled me.
Don't be so quick to assume, Nami. You might end up caught even more off-guard if an actual robot shows up.
Don't take offense, Nami, but your robot detection skills need some more work. There could be other robots here you've overlooked, after all...
A poem? Odd time to ask, but... I won't shoot down your enthusiasm.
...Is there a reason you're not looking at me right now, Tomoko?
I find the catchiest nicknames are just three letters, so... "Kum"? Wait, no...
The closest thing that comes to that for me is Adam, but... we keep things professional.
I do respect your dedication to the costume, friend. Just a shame your dedication to the act stops there.
So, what's your outfit like, ~militarytarget~? Some sort of official government force, or merc group?
Haven't really met many soldiers outside the Federation. I'd hope yours is just as responsible, ~militarytarget~.
It's interesting... sometimes the Federation finds worlds that are also pretty advanced, but their cultures are always so different - like yours, ~futuretarget~.
The place you're from, ~futuretarget~... what's the state of its space travel capabilities? I'd assume at least somewhat active.
Oh, name’s Samus. Bounty hunter. Pleasure’s mine.
My name’s Samus, by the way. Hunter employed by the Federation. Rest of you?
I know what you’re thinking, and yes - I do usually take my armor most places I go. You’ve all got your own things you usually don’t leave home without, right?
Got to say, one of the most uncomfortable things I did by mistake was go on a mission and forget my zero suit - any of you do anything like that?
No matter how far I go, there's always more planets with more life to discover... have any of you made such discoveries?
You know, some people are still surprised when they see me without my armor and find out I’m a woman. Weird, isn't it?
It's strange... to some people, power armor always carries the expectation that a man's inside it. Never got why.
I don't usually go around public places in my Zero Suit, but I typically get stares when I do. I think I'm starting to understand why...
Looking at it now, my Zero Suit really shows off my form, doesn't it? Is it... well, appealing to you, ~player~?
My undergarments show off a lot more skin than the Zero Suit, don't they? Gets me even more stares than I already had...
Actually, it just occurred to me... skin-tight suits like that probably inspire certain kinks, don't they? This isn't a downgrade, is it?
Being a super-athlete means I'm able to stretch my body in all sorts of ways. What do you think of that, ~player~?
Funny. I have yet to get to my top or shorts, and you're still looking pretty hungrily at me, ~player~. Be honest - is it my midriff?
I've seen a few dirty videos before where the women play with their own breasts. I'd try that here, if it wasn't for the cards I'm holding.
I've figured people probably compare breasts to some degree... but I don't know how much you can really do that beyond personal preference.
Do you usually get flustered this easily, ~player~? That's... pretty cute.
Bit of a shame you never dropped your cards, ~player~ - I was kind of hoping I could see what you look like bending over.
If that's a serious question: Yes, this is armor. In case you don't know, it helps protect you in combat.
I just prefer to know I'm protected whenever I'm in someplace new. Perhaps the notion's lost on someone as bold as you.
When you've been in as many fights as me, you come to prefer the feeling of being well-armored. You should try it sometime.
I don't know what people in your world use, but I don't see any reason to change it. My armor's never failed me.
I've trained to use this armor all my life - don't think there's any reason to stop using it now. There's no problem with that, is there?
Settle down there - I don't know what this "Harvest" is, but I can assure you I'm not one of them.
Relax, Jura. Whatever has you so scared of this "Harvest", you have no reason to fear the same from me.
Is being stoic such a bad thing? You seem strangely fixated on this idea.
Maybe I am, maybe I'm not. You'll just have to play and see, right?
...Heh heh. Sorry, just--- you're not actually the first one to assume I'm a robot of some sort.
...Hahah. Sorry, I don't mean to put you off, Meia; I just find it funny when people assume I'm a robot.
Indeed. As much as meeting other life has changed our world for the better, there's other difficulties it's brought on, too.
Correct. Humanity learned a long time ago that it's not alone in the universe - for both the good and bad that it brings.
It's not standard-issue, no. The Federation's tried replicating its design for its soldiers, but it's still one-of-a-kind.
It might surprise you, Meia, but this suit's the only one of its kind. Federation still tries pretty hard to match the specs, though.
It's complicated, Sucrose. To put it simply, it's a mix between concentrated energy and my own willpower.
My suit's powered by a concentrated energy supply, and my own force of will. There's more to it than that, but the explanation would be pretty long, Sucrose.
Interesting... so you're a fellow bounty hunter, then? I wasn't sure if any independent systems had those.
I see. So... you're also in the bounty hunting business? I didn't think I'd meet another one on a new planet like this.
What's it like? Well, that'd be a pretty long answer. It's most of what I've ever known, after all.
If you want to know what bounty hunting's like, then you'd have to be prepared to listen for a while. It's practically what I was made for.
Perhaps. I just feel most comfortable when I stay focused on what's ahead, Tao - I've always assumed such levity to just get in the way.
I've always assumed not taking my job seriously enough would result in losing focus on the task at hand. Then again, it's not like I've given your theory a try either, Tao.
No need - keeping it clean and functional is second nature to me. I appreciate the offer though, Senko.
Thank you, Senko, but you don't need to worry. Making sure it's well-maintained is as important as any one of my missions.
Don't worry about it, Senko. I don't take offense to it - even if it does get old.
It's fine, Senko. It'd be useless to get mad about it - especially after how many times it's happened.
You're correct, Yuri. I've seen and fought all sorts of dangerous things. Space pirates usually come to mind first, though Metroids come soon after.
There's a lot, Yuri. Between organized monsters like the space pirates and enigmatic creatures like Metroids, there's no shortage of answers I'd have.
We all came here to impress, right, Fina? I don't doubt you'll find this pretty impressive.
I'm unfamiliar with these "Youkai". Are they an alien species, or are they native to your world, Reimu?
A robot? You must think of yourself as quite the expert on those, Nami - if you're so certain this isn't just a power suit, that is.
And what makes you so certain this isn't just a powered suit with a person inside, Nami? Unless you've studied many robots before?
I've gotten both assumptions before. The one that I'm a man always confuses me... though I find the robot one pretty amusing.
People are often quick to assume either of those. The robot one is at least understandable - not to mention a bit funny. I don't get why they'd assume I'm a man, though.
Not at all - my Power Suit's perfectly attuned so there's no discomfort when wearing it. In fact, the Zero Suit helps with that.
You don't need to worry. The Zero Suit's designed to increase comfort with the Power Suit. And if it was too cumbersome or taxing to use for a while, I would've found a replacement long ago.
Thankfully, no. Years of practice have allowed me to be just as deft with a single hand as I am with two.
You're right about that, Barbara. Half the time I don't even know what I'm about to be facing, so you can never be too careful.
You notice well, Barbara. It pays to be as prepared as possible, especially when going into new places, where I'm not sure what I'll be facing.
There's been a lot of advancements made in space technology where I come from, Cynthia - even so, this is one-of-a-kind.
You're right, Cynthia. Granted, this is a unique one, but other power suits have come a long way from where we were hundreds of years ago.
It's quite comfortable, Petra. In fact, I wear it because it allows me to be more comfortable while wearing my Power Suit.
If you're concerned about the tightness, Petra, don't be. It's actually designed to give the most comfort possible while wearing my Power Suit.
Got tired of me staying on top? Sorry, that's just usually how I roll.
Well, it had to happen to someone. Might as well be me.
Alright, fair’s fair. Can’t say no to a legitimate win.
Okay, you got me. Suppose this makes it a little more even anyway.
We've all got dues to pay for our actions... all things considered, this isn't so bad.
Don't let this get to your head - a bounty hunter always keeps her cool until she's beaten.
I don't mind losing again... as long as you don't mind losing soon after too.
Enjoy it while it lasts - you might not last much longer.
Well then... looks like my game's about to really begin.
Took you long enough. You want to see me for real, huh?
Guess I'm about to make the game more interesting for you. You're welcome.
Not where I expected to be right now... good thing I keep my plans flexible.
I may not be a people person, but I'm not dense enough to try circumventing the rules.
Hm... maybe if I'd swapped out that other card instead...
Guess I should re-think my play here soon. As for now...
Alright, I'm still well enough ahead... I'm not ready to call it downhill from here.
Eh, I'm used to tough luck anyhow. It pays to be prepared - mentally as much as physically.
Mm... I've got to admit, you have me a little concerned by now.
Huh, looks like I may need to start changing up my plan for real after all...
I'm not one to place my faith in luck, but... wonder if it's starting to pass me by.
Well, we're still on the same playing field, at least. A winning chance is still a chance.
So... you're ready to see me for real?
So, want to take bets on what I'll take off first? Because you're all probably right.
...I hear a couple of you chuckling. I assure you, the humor of this is not lost on me.
Okay, then… might as well enjoy this.
Don’t worry, I’ll play fair. I’m not like those dirty pirates.
You don’t have to beat me that quickly while I’m here, you know. You’ll be seeing my body either way.
Looks like I might be taking a plunge... but it is what it is.
Much as I don't like losing... I'd hate being a poor sport even more.
Huh, guess it's going to be earlier for me than I thought.
I was actually curious as to how long I'd go before taking this off. Guess it wasn't so long after all.
That quick, hm... looks like this'll be a harder game than I thought.
Alright, well... To me, it's more than just a job. It's a way of life. Ever since I was a child, I was raised to be the ultimate warrior of the Chozo, the people who adopted me.
Okay, then... Most see being a bounty hunter as a means to make money. But to me, as someone who was trained by the Chozo to be their prodigy, it's everything.
Well, thank you - I wasn't expecting such flattery so soon. I can tell you about such accomplishments if you'd like... though you might want to stand back for this.
Not quite - the job of a bounty hunter's different. Still, I like to think my actions are as noble as such imagery... Oh, before we continue-
Let's just chalk it up to cultural differences, then. Oh, speaking of which-
Well, if it bothers you that much, don't worry - it's not going to be on for much longer.
I apologize. It's just that I'm not exactly used to this yet. Even years ago, socializing didn't come as naturally to me.
Sorry, then. I'm still just trying to get accustomed to all this - even beyond the lecherous nature of this place, I feel out of sorts.
It's not a hassle to use, but having it on all the time would be a waste. Speaking of which...
I'm a bit glad to be removing it now, actually. Having it on when I don't need it is just impractical.
A back massage? Huh... you're pretty eager to make up for just a small misunderstanding.
Really? This is definitely the first time someone's offered a back massage after that misunderstanding.
Well, you're about to see either way, so you might as well enjoy the show.
You'll have to pay attention, then. I don't think you want to miss this.
Well, if you all agreed to do the same when it gets down to you… then I’m fine with this.
Wearing my Power Suit here is a bit overkill, I'll admit. I could probably collapse this entire building with it.
Well, you managed to get one good win on me so far - guess you deserve a proper look.
Alright, I’ll knock it off with the Power Suit. Don’t think it’s the kind of thing people come here to see anyhow.
Don’t usually like taking off my holster in new places… but I’ll make an exception for this one.
I don't usually use my blaster on missions, but it always buys me time in a pinch - just like this.
Eh, both of these seem too small to knock off one at a time. I’ll give you a two-for-one deal.
This thing’s always a pain to get off after a long mission - but damn is it relieving.
Zero Suit’s easier to get off now, at least - working up a sweat in it tends to make it stick to you more.
Wait--- dammit, zipper’s stuck, this is going to take a while… Heh, just kidding. Imagine how awkward that’d be, right?
Sorry, but it’s hard to make taking off a Zero Suit look sexy - they don’t usually come off easily.
I actually knew a few Federation soldiers who customize their suits a bit. Personally I never cared for doing something so gaudy.
Thankfully, I don't need to worry about folds or wrinkles with my Zero Suit - which is good, because cleaning it's not always easy.
I know, boots are probably a bit underwhelming after the Zero Suit. Just prefer taking them off next.
Yes, I’ve taken a while to get to the boots. They’re special boots, alright?
You know, it’s kind of weird - I realize my pals in Smash have seen me without my Zero Suit more than without my boots.
I’m sure this is what some of you came for; hope it lives up to whatever expectations you’ve got.
Never minded the prospect of this, to be honest - if guys can show off their chests and feel comfy with it, why not me?
Always knew there was a chance of this when I walked in here. Got over my discomfort a long time ago.
I’ll try to make this look as good as I can… consider it a thanks for being quite the good lookers yourselves.
You don’t have to offer me any sympathy, by the way - I wouldn’t be here if I didn't want a little excitement.
...Does me being a woman make that better, then? Don't know how I should feel about that.
...You're the type who prefers women, then? Or do you mean in general?
Well... I do appreciate your determination with this. That's worth a lot.
You're that determined to help me loosen up, are you? I... do admire that.
...Relax, Sucrose. I wouldn't use anything so unsafe that I'd risk exploding out of nowhere like that.
...I'm fine. Are you used to dealing with tech that's prone to exploding, Sucrose?
...Hm. I'm already surprising you again and again, Senko?
...Does it shock you that much, Senko? I'd actually figured you could already tell.
It's one-of-a-kind, Fina. Probably beyond what you're even picturing with these Moon Stones you speak of.
...That surprised, Nami? You didn't really think an actual robot would come to this kind of place, did you?
...Pull yourself together, Nami. I came to make you take off your clothes, not your jaw.
...Long story. Let's just say it's not one you could find readily available, Miku.
So, yep - this is me. Guess this is a more "proper" hello anyhow.
Well, here I am - the gal who’s gonna be beating you all tonight.
Hope you find this a lot more enticing… unless you’ve got a thing for power armor, in which case: sorry.
It better still have its upgrades when I get it back…
That's about it for equipment. Guess the game's really on for me now.
Thankfully, I’m still far from helpless without it… That goes to any of you looking at it funny here.
This is one of the easier parts, thankfully. Zero Suit: retract.
If you were expecting me to go commando tonight, well, shame to burst your bubble. Zero Suit: retract.
Zero Suit: retract. Time to start really playing like I mean it.
I've heard a couple Federation troops gripe that I have better boots than them. But that's not entirely true... I just am better.
I wear those things so much that honestly, it feels kind of weird not having them on... at least, when I'm not sleeping, anyway.
I'm just pretty reluctant about leaving those in a place as public as this. Those things cost more than what any of you make in a month.
I have to say, this feels... better than I thought it would.
Huh... you know, being this exposed without worrying about it actually feels kind of nice.
...Strange. This feels a lot more comfortable than I expected.
Well... I'm just one loss away. Think you can take me?
Alright... got a good look? Then here we go - last stand time for me.
Don't think I'll be making this any easier. Keep your eyes on me, and they won't be on the game anymore.
Jim Raynor, you said? Interesting... you carry yourself so casually, yet you have a strong air about you - the kind I typically see among Federation officers.
Raynor... you seem like the type I'd expect to see at a casual place like this, but I sense there's more to you than that.
Is that... Is that a rocket launcher? They'll really let just about anyone in, won't they?
I'm at risk at sounding hypocritical, but... they let you bring an entire rocket launcher to a place like this?
So who are you, exactly? I've seen people as passionate about card games as you, and they tend to come in certain types.
It's been a while since I went to any card games, but I noticed they tended to attract certain flavors of people... which are you?
You mentioned earlier that you're an agent, Leon? What kind of work do you do?
I couldn't help taking interest, Leon - what does your job as an agent involve for you?
I'm still trying to figure out your strategy, ~name~... do you even have one?
I'm impressed by your determination, ~name~. That's one thing you've got going for you, at least.
Don't tell me you've lost your nerve already - the game's just begun.
Win for me. Mind giving me my reward?
Rest of us are going to have fun either way, so you might as well have some fun with it too.
Heh. Not so easy to beat me, is it?
Strategy's working well enough so far... though that's still subject to change.
I'm interested to see where else this game goes... including where you're about to take it.
Tell you what - put on a good show and I’ll do the same.
Still a bit unsure about this place… want to help me with that?
You're not the only one with your dignity on the table, ~name~ - we're all playing equal here.
I know it's probably a bit weird, stripping in front of someone in full power armor, but... try not to think about it, I suppose?
Not an easy game, is it?
Just because I've taken some hits, doesn't mean I'm ready to give up the fight.
I'm never helpless just because I've lost my power suit. More people - and creatures - would do well to remember that.
I took off an entire power suit earlier - mind trying something at least half as impressive?
I've watched you long enough in this game... I think I'm understanding your strategy now.
Alright, ~name~. Show us what you’ve got.
Don’t worry, I’m off-duty. I can’t arrest you for flashing an official hunter or anything.
Analyzing specimens is something I do pretty often. Mind if I do the same to you?
You're actually human? That's strange... but the way you talk is comparable to intelligent races that have only recently made first contact with the Federation.
Really? The only creatures I've seen talk like you are species who are still grasping human language - I've never even seen a human like that.
Really... so the color pattern of my armor is what keeps you from understanding my intent?
Wasn't expecting to meet another spacefarer here, Meia. Where do you hail from?
Looks like I'm not the only space traveller here after all. I assume you're not from Fed space, so where are you from, Meia?
Strange... your armor looks primative at a glance, Pyrrha, yet something tells me there's far more to it than that.
Hm... for someone whose armor calls back to a bygone age, I have a feeling it's far more advanced than that, Pyrrha.
Are those... religious vestments? They don't look like any Earth faith I've heard of...
Hm... I'd almost assume those to be holy symbols you're wearing, but I'm afraid I don't recognize any of them.
Huh. And here I thought I wasn't a people person...
Well, I guess I don't have to worry about being the most awkward one here after all...
An idol? Don't you types try to avoid being too public?
Didn't expect to find an idol here - I thought you all tried to keep personal stuff on the down-low.
I've seen a few lifeforms with limited pyrokinesis before. None that adopted a human appearance so thoroughly, though.
Didn't expect to find a lifeform with limited pyrokinesis here. Nor one what mimicked a human look so well.
Your garb... are you a priest of some kind of faith, Yuna?
I apologize if I don't recognize your religion, Yuna - I'm not familiar with religious clothes like yours.
...You brought a knife? Are you planning to impress us with your Five Finger Fillet skills?
Alright, if no one else is going to ask; what's with the knife? I'm hoping it's just for show.
You mentioned Pokemon earlier, Rosa? I actually know a fair bit about them, myself.
This may surprise you, Rosa, but I'm pretty familiar with Pokemon myself.
It's nice to meet another mercenary here, Leonie - especially one who's in it for more than just money.
Another soldier-for-hire, Leonie? I'm glad to see you take it seriously, and not just as a cashgrab.
What species are you, Petra? I'd assume a shapeshifting type, given your appearance.
Species capable of mimmicking human appearance are pretty rare - which type are you, Petra?
You mentioned a place called "Demacia", right, Lux? I don't recall it appearing in any Federation databases.
I've never heard of this "Demacia" you mentioned earlier, Lux - is it on an outer-rim planet?
Fascinating... human in most regards, but with minor additions of feline anatomy... how is this possible?
You're human, aren't you? And yet with non-homologous features of a cat... I can scarcely believe it's real.
You mentioned experience with virtual reality earlier, Asuna? I'm a bit familiar with the concept, but not much.
I've never learned much about virtual reality - at least, its use by civillians. Care to enlighten me, Asuna?
Tell me about these entertainment programs, Asuna. I'm interested in the concept of VR being so widely available to people.
What else can you tell me about VR in your world, Asuna? It's fascinating to hear how it's become so widely adopted by the public.
That's quite the striking wardrobe you have there, Stocking. Is it a popluar fashion trend where you're from?
I've never seen clothing like yours, Stocking. Then again, I've never been one to keep up with fashion trends to begin with.
You said you're a bioalchemist, Sucrose? I didn't realize there were alchemy fields that specific out there.
I'm interested in what you said earlier about bioalchemy, Sucrose. I wouldn't have guessed there'd be a specific field of science combining two others like that.
So let me get this straight, Charlie: You want us to believe that you're a demon?
So, Charlie... you're saying that you're a demon?
Why did you decide to come here, Yuri? You look like you feel out of sorts here.
Are you feeling awkward here, Yuri? I'll admit, I didn't expect to see someone like you here.
You're a military officer, Hilda? I wouldn't have guessed from seeing you at a glance.
This might sound like an odd question, Hilda, but are you really a military officer?
You said that you're digital, Miku? So you're an entire artificial intelligence given form?
Let me get this straight, Miku: You're an artificial intelligence with a physical form? I assumed that's what you meant when you said you're digital.
Hmph. You're truly a shining example of the conveniences of civilized resources, Erufuda... for better and worse.
Well, Erufuda... you certainly look like you're well-versed in modern society's conveniences - as are many with no self-control.
You're a researcher, Cynthia? I didn't expect to find another here today.
I didn't know I would be able to find other researchers here, Cynthia. Especially considering the "lowbrow" nature of this game.
You're awfully close with ~player~, aren't you, Monika?
It's curious, I didn't expect to see anyone quite so close with each other here today. Have you and ~player~ been like this a while, Monika?
Have you played this sort of game before, Miki? You seem pretty comfortable with it.
You're taking to the nature of this game awfully well, Miki. Do you come here often?
You're not shy at all about your faith, are you, Barbara? It must be really important to you.
It's interesting to see someone so fervently religious in a place like this, Barbara. Your god is always on your mind this much?
Why? Are most summoners able to do that, Yuna?
Never underestimate your opponents, ~name~. That's one of the best things you can learn.
Federation officers have a saying, ~name~: "If you fail to plan, you plan to fail."
Got to say, I think I’m getting better at this than I used to be.
And here I thought I was going to be rusty at this...
You're not just letting me win, are you? That'd be awfully boring.
Any chance I can convince you all to start playing for money? No dice? Dang…
You know, I’m curious… Why am I so good?
I don't think I'd survive as a professional gambler, but... I don't think I'd go down that quickly, either.
Hope you weren't expecting an easy opponent tonight, ~name~.
With any luck, I can keep this up for a while...
That’s you, ~name~. Hope you don’t disappoint.
Don’t mind me, ~name~... I certainly don’t mind you.
If this place is full of good-looking people like you, ~name~... maybe I ought to tell some other hunters I know about this place too.
We're not judging you for losing, ~name~. Just make this good.
Put your best foot forward, ~name~ - it won't be fun unless you're enjoying it too.
Another win. Maybe it's finally in my favor again...
I know I'm probably going to go down at this point, but I'm still happy to not make it easy.
Between you and me, ~name~... it's going to be you.
Don't take it personally, ~name~. I'm still trying to win, after all.
Don't be intimidated, ~name~ - just try imagining me in my underwear. Or whatever you think I've got under here, anyway.
I didn't expect to see a young adventurer such as yourself here, Aaravi - how long have you been doing it for?
So how long ago did you begin your path of adventuring, Aaravi? It's been a while since I've seen one as young as you.
A tie? I don't think I ever got those even back when I played more often...
Is this it? Is this really the game?
Not in much of a hurry, are you?
Fine. I’m not much of a people person either.
Well, you’re boring. Not that that’s a crime.
Hm... maybe I just built my expectations too high.
Alright... how long until this starts getting arousing?
I hope you came here to have fun, ~name~. I'm sure the rest of us did.
Huh... for some reason I thought you'd be bolder.
Still nervous about this, ~name~?
I'd ask if you find this funny, but I also think you're better than that.
I hope you're not choosing something that small as a jab at me.
Sheesh... way to show off how good you are at switching cards.
That torn on deciding what to remove, huh?
I'm not embarassed by this. At least, not as much as you clearly are.
I don't believe in luck... but there's something against me today.
I’ll take the moments of calm when I can get them.
Is this really how men like you pass the time?
I doubt you’d actually have anything to surprise me with anyway…
It’s one thing to stall in a fight... but you’re trying to have fun here, right?
Well, baby steps are better than nothing, I suppose.
Eh... I guess most others would do the same.
I don't think anyone will mind if you go bigger next time, ~name~. Some of us might even enjoy it.
Well... I suppose it'd be unfair to judge anyway.
Eh, it's fine. I'll admit this is still pretty odd to me too.
Hm... then again, I haven't exactly gone the distance yet myself.
Just so you know, you don't have to be so reluctant. We're not a bunch of Federation officers or anything.
Guess it's all the more reason for me to try being bolder, right?
Well, I hope you're prepared to be one-upped sooner or later...
Guess I might've overprepared after all...
I guess the good news is I don't have to worry too much about not impressing.
That determined to hold out, are you?
If you're looking to impress me, then now would be the time to start going big.
Fine. I'll deal with it.
Guess this is how the night's just going, then.
Alright... all things considered, I'd rather be frustrated by this than suddenly noticing I'm out of missiles while deep in Zebes.
...Do you usually attempt to flirt with women like this?
Hm… do women tend to pretty themselves up with stuff like that?
Never gave much mind to accessorizing like that. I’m not really a “night on the town” kind of person.
I can’t help but wonder sometimes how I’d look if I chose to accessorize a bit more.
If your intention was to be unimpressive, then I assure you you’re succeeding.
Right. Should’ve guessed that would be next...
...This is going to get fun eventually, right?
Still early on... guess chosing your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ for the best.
I don't want to complain, considering I'm still well ahead too... but this'll pick up soon, right?
Going to be the slow and steady kind of game, huh?
We're going to do this little by little, then? So be it.
Guess I might as well enjoy this... hard as it may be.
Well, on the bright side, I can already count on making the biggest move when it comes to me.
Hm... this certainly makes my own plan for when it comes to me a lot bolder.
Alright, then... almost makes me feel a bit overprepared...
Progress is still progress... even if I'm playing some catch-up.
You're still ahead of me... all the more reason for me to start doing better.
Just ~clothing~, huh... fine. Anything that knocks you down a bit more by this point.
...You're mocking me, aren't you?
I know it's been a while since I've really played, but I still didn't think I'd be doing this badly.
Sure wish I had ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ right now...
I guess I can’t blame you too much for starting small. This isn’t exactly Chutes and Ladders we’re playing.
Not that I could, anyway. There’s not much room for extra amenities with a power suit.
Whatever. You can’t delay forever.
Anyway, shall we continue? I don’t want to linger on the small stuff.
...Maybe I shouldn’t judge. This is still a pretty unusual kind of game, after all.
Guess boldness just isn't in your nature. At least, not that kind.
Oh, well - I'll admit I haven't really jumped at the chance to go full-throttle myself just yet.
Guess I can't judge - I've still just dipped my toes in the water too.
Hm... between you and me, this game might last longer than I thought.
Wonder if I could try just removing my helmet... nah.
Nothing that small that really comes off this suit... guess my play'll be bigger either way.
For the record, boots aren't considered too small, right? Figured they're not, just checking.
Let's see... got to focus on pairs next...
Wish I could analyze how this deck is shuffled... then again, that might be cheating.
Mm... it's really starting to hit me how much I need to up my game here.
Well... this is better than suddenly realizing I'm several missiles short on Zebes, or the like.
Keep your chin up, ~name~. I'm doing my best despite my mounting losses.
Not a bad choice, ~name~. Not really a good one, but not a bad one.
Looks good on you. Not that I’m upset about seeing it come off or anything.
That something guys typically wear where you come from? Never really got into any trends, so I wouldn’t know.
Is that expensive where you’re from? When you’ve travelled as much as I have, you find different exchange rates everywhere.
Wonder if people like Ghor ever thought about sprucing up with ~clothing.ifPlural( |a)~ ~clothing~ like that. He always seemed to lament how dull his cybernetics look.
Think I saw a pirate with ~clothing.ifPlural( |a)~ ~clothing~ like that once, believe it or not… of course, it turned out to be one of their deadly gadgets in disguise.
Victory isn’t a concept worth getting attached to. There’s always another fight waiting somewhere…
Most talking I do with other people is usually on military bases. It's nice for things to be different for once.
I've lost a few pieces of armor while on a mission before. Thankfully it's not hard to get fixed up - just inconvenient.
Guess this is one of the few circumstances where losing my equipment on a new world wouldn't be too worrying - or dare I say, unexpected.
Still thinking about how I'll do this... should I start with smaller things and go up from there, or mix it up?
It's interesting... do most people come in here with a set stripping order in mind, or do they just make it up as they go?
Come on... there's got to be some other way to make conversation right now...
You know, my suit doesn't really... wait, did I talk about that already?
Jeez, it's hard enough connecting with people even when I'm not recovering post-climax.
(Come on, think of something to talk about. Star systems, alien lifeforms, anything.)
Hope you're not still trying to stall, ~name~. I'm still open to being impressed.
I may be finished here, but my interest in seeing how you try being sexy isn't.
You can still go bigger, can't you, ~player~? I'd certainly hope so.
You're still in this to the end, ~player~. All I can do is hope our new friends are better at stripping you down than I was.
I don't mind you still looking, ~player~. Especially since it might distract you enough to lose more.
I may have lost, but... if I can take you with me, ~player~, I'll consider it victory enough.
Besides, considering how I currently am, I'd hope it'd push you to being more bold.
After all, my mission when I came here was to enjoy some titilating sights... and it's not quite accomplished just yet.
Well, either way, let’s see how your game plan goes from here.
Suppose it’s not important right now. Not as important as wiping you out of this, anyway.
Hope you’re not sullen about this - it’s not the biggest loss you can take. That’s for later.
Victory comes bit by bit… and I’m still getting there.
Haven’t gotten quite the full study of you just yet, ~name~... what do you say to speeding up the process?
Glad you’re not taking the loss personally, by the way. Then I’d almost feel bad for aiming to make you lose again.
Strange... didn't expect to be thinking about that sort of stuff here.
Maybe this game can be even more interesting than I thought...
This really is a one-of-a-kind sort of place, isn't it...?
Wonder what the other hunters I know would be thinking about this...
That ~clothing~ sure looked good on you. Wait, where do I go from there...?
So... staff here sure is accomodating, huh?
Some others here seem to have plenty of jokes about this place. Maybe if I'd brought a pun book or something...
Actually... what's the rest of this planet like? There's a larger world beyond this place, right?
Alright, we're getting there... and so am I...
Yeah... I like that.
Not bad... just go bigger next time, alright?
~clothing.ifPlural(Do those|Does that)~ ~clothing~ ever get heavy after a bit, ~name~? Because you could think of this as a relief.
Anyone know when this place was built? No? Who should I ask?
We’re not being given orders on how to do this. Take off whatever you want.
I haven’t met many human women outside of the Federation. I’ve talked to even less.
It’s quiet here… But it’s not the same kind of quiet you feel in the cold reaches of space. I like it.
If I were impatient, I wouldn’t be here to ~background.time~.
Just as I predicted, you’re taking off your ~clothing~. Good to see I can still read people.
We’re all here for a bit of maintenance, right? I don’t see any reason to rush it.
My current plan's going pretty well... of course, experience has taught me that never lasts.
Hm... Game's going good for me so far. Too good.
A thought occurred... what if someone comes in with something that's harder to take off? Do we just keep waiting?
Heh... just pictured what would happen if somehow we all brought power armor here. Not exactly a sexy beginning for this sort of game.
I don't really drink, but... does this place have anything good?
Have to say, it's nice being in a foreign world where everything isn't trying to kill me for once.
How often do you take care of your ~clothing~, ~name~? My Zero Suit usually doesn't require much maintainence.
Any particularly expensive parts of your outfit, ~name~? Other than the obvious, my boots are pretty pricey.
Actually, where does this place get its provisions from? It seems disconnected from just about any society or organization...
It's odd - I tried pulling up this planet on my ship's starmap earlier, but the data kept glitching...
Enjoy taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~, because it'll be your... wait, no, that doesn't work...
Keep your head in the game, ~name~... better than I have, anyway.
Sorry. I'm not that good at... conversation. Even when I'm fully clothed.
So, ~name~, do you come here... uh, no, too predictable.
People really come here from all over, huh... a Metroid might not even look that odd to some of them.
So, do you always taking your ~clothing~ off like... that?
Wait, no one really knows? This place is getting weird and weirder by the second…
Sigh... Still as insociable as ever, Sammy...
Maybe you and I can get a drink later, ~name~. I’ve got time.
I’ll just be just observing you for now. No problem with that, is there?
People who rush into reckless choices never last long in my experience. You’re doing fine, ~name~.
I’m not here to be intrusive. Engage with me at your own pace.
Is this something you do on the regular? Kind of makes me wish I had that much time.
You’re going to be wishing you still had ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ when I beat you again.
I don’t need to be competitive. I know I’m fully capable of winning.
I can think of worse ways to spend my time off. Not bad, ~name~.
In any case, I'm interested in seeing how you'll play from here, ~name~.
Well, I can ponder about it more later. Right now, I have a game to win.
The Inventory sure has a lot of curiosities to it - both the place and its patrons.
There's certainly a lot of interesting things about what I've seen so far here...
Feels like I'm exploring a new planet yet again here... though it's nice that it doesn't come with the threat of death this time.
Hm... I could tell the Federation about this world, but... I'm not sure if I want to just yet.
Guess now's not the time to think about it. The game's always moving, after all.
Ah, the next round's already about to start. Right.
Well, you do look pretty good, ~name~. I'm confident saying that.
Either way, I'm glad to be making more progress here - precarious as my odds may be.
You are a good looker, ~name~ - I'm glad I chose today to come here.
In all seriousness, you're doing a good job, ~name~. At the stripping part, anyway.
At least I can appreciate how nice you look. Hope I can be straightforward about that.
I'm getting somewhere with this, though - even if it's come at the cost of some losses.
Alright, things are getting interesting…
Come on, you weren’t really expecting to stay on top forever, were you?
I’ve had my own share of fantasies… you helping me make it happen is real nice of you.
Take your time, ~name~... kind of makes it better that way.
Talk all you want; I’m happy to listen and watch.
Hey, you already got me out of my power suit anyway - fair’s fair.
Good timing... mind taking it a bit slower?
I want this to last, ~name~... you'd better make it.
That's right... let me get a good look at all of it...
Mind if I keep this mental snapshot? Long trips of bounty hunting tend to... well, never mind.
Who knows - if circumstances are just right tonight, you might not need that back at all, ~name~.
Heh… thanks, ~name~. For sticking around.
I like your stripping style, ~name~. And to show my appreciation... I’m going make you lose again.
Better watch out, ~name~ - I’m hunting for you now.
I don't know why... but something about looking at you makes me wish I brought my cuffs with me, ~name~.
You wouldn't happen to have anything dangerous on you, would you, ~name~? I'm looking for an excuse to pin you down right now.
So, how easily do you think you could escape a grapple, ~name~? Just wondering.
I've still got my eye on you, ~name~. Even if you're technically not my opponent anymore.
(This wouldn’t be a bad time to try flirting. Can’t be that hard, just flatter ~name~, and mission accomplished.)
Now we’re getting somewhere.
Maybe every situation I step into doesn’t have to be terrible… Or this is just an outlier.
Calm down, everyone. You’re killing the mood.
My heart’s beating pretty fast right now. That’s usually not a good thing.
I’m focused on you, ~name~. No pressure.
This is what we came for... or what we're going to, so to speak.
You know what they- ah, say, slow and steady...
Give me something I can really work with, ~name~.
To be honest, I'm glad you've lost again right now, ~name~.
Never seen a bombshell quite like you, ~name~, and I should know.
I think you just set off a rocket in my heart… Uh, right?
I’ve seen plenty of stars, but right now you’re shining brighter than… Wait, no, forget it.
...Okay, look, I’m not very good at being creative with flirtations. Can I just say you’re pretty and keep it simple?
Ready to lose yet, ~name~? Because you should’ve been as soon as I stepped in.
You’re a good looker, ~name~. You might as well be confident in that.
I used to be in the Federation Police Force, ~name~ - if I'd gotten to take in more perps as pretty as you, I might've stayed.
Don't mind me, ~name~. I'm just wondering how you'd look down on the ground like that...
Too late to escape now, ~name~. But hopefully you won't even want to.
Just need to focus on pairs... uh, the cards, I mean.
Hey, it's still way better than losing ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ permanently... trust me, I know.
I've heard some guys wear undershirts... is that like your equivalent of a bra?
So this is where we're really going to start seeing some skin, right? Hope it lives up.
Just relax, ~name~ - no one here's going to bite you... At least, no one here's got traits typical among alien species who would.
Don't be nervous, ~name~; we're the only species that cares about this sort of thing, after all... Not that you shouldn't care outside of here, of course.
Can’t count how the amount of men who come up to me, thinking I’ll be all over them just because they got a decent chest or thorax or… actually, nevermind. You look fine, ~name~.
You’re not bad, but can you keep up with me?
It's good to see someone who takes their fitness seriously... and isn't just doing it to impress girls.
...What kind of training do you do, ~name~? I do mine alone most of the time, so I don't know how many others do it.
I don’t care much about how your chest looks. What matters to me is how you carry yourself.
Don't be so self-conscious; confidence is more impressive than anything else.
We all came here for an interesting game, ~name~. You can be happy you've helped with that.
If people here are going to be examining my chest tonight, it's only fair that I'm allowed to do the same.
I’m still in the game, and ~name~’s about to unleash the beast… looks like luck’s on my side this time after all.
Come on, you’re not feeling shy now, are you, ~name~?
You know the saying, “Don’t take anything onto a ship you aren’t prepared to lose”? Well… I think it’s too late to have regrets about coming here now.
Sorry, ~name~, I’m not the type you can pull away from an analysis easily - on work or off.
You knew the risks of this gig, pal. I intend to get my reward for this.
You don’t have an exo-skeleton, that already makes you more appealing than half the men I meet.
Just how resourceful are you in the bedroom? There’s still a few ways we could have a good time together.
So what? Do you have dexterous fingers? Are you willing to trade places in bed? Look, I’m giving you as many extra chances here as I reasonably can.
Hell... by this point, I'll take anything...
That'll do, ~name~... that'll do.
Technique's always more important than what you've got, ~name~. The best blaster in the galaxy won't help you if you don't know how to use it.
I won't say you've won me over, ~name~... but you definitely haven't lost me, either.
Alright, you've got my attention. Question is how you measure up as a whole.
Yeah... I'm real good with this.
Hmm... let me get a better look...
Alright… Consider me intrigued.
It’d take a lot of experience to handle that thing… (I’m not worried about being out of practice, am I?)
Jeez, didn't expect this sort of situation. Guess I'd have to improvise...
Man... never thought I'd see one that big for real...
Usually don't fantasize about ones so big but... might as well try something different right now.
I don’t know about you, ~name~, but I’m interested in where this is going...
Look me in the eyes, ~name~... Wait, sorry. Mine were kind of looking somewhere else.
You’re a sight for sore eyes already, ~name~ - especially those of a bounty hunter who’s been away for too long. Mind making this really good?
Don’t act so modest. Pretty sure most people here were hoping for this moment tonight.
I’ve met humanoid species that don’t even have breasts, and species that have eight. Goes without saying that you’re fine.
You still look good, but that's not the only thing on my mind. You lost and you’re exposed - how are you going to handle it?
I've had my eyes on more than your breasts for quite some time now, ~name~. You have plenty of attractive features.
Small, but... now's not the time to feel picky.
Oh, sorry... head's getting so fuzzy I didn't see them at first.
Alright... I can work with this.
You look good, ~name~... and judging from ~player~'s reaction, looks like ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ agrees.
The advent of human modification made certain breast changes pretty popular in Federation worlds. Personally, I always preferred natural ones like yours.
Huh... just occurred to me how I've seen way more breasts on new alien lifeforms than I have on other people.
I'm not easy to impress, ~name~... but you're definitely getting there.
Don't try too hard. Just let them be...
I like how they look on their own... just stand still for a moment.
Mmf... definitely a sight I needed right now...
...Do you get flirted with often, ~name~? I'd hope it's at least not so unimaginative as to mostly be about your chest size.
Goes without saying your chest is impressive, ~name~ - just don't let it get to your head here.
Hmm... maybe I'm a "tits woman" after all...
Well... pretty good time for me to have lost, then.
If I had to lose... then I'm glad I've done it at this point.
Personally, I don't think I'd like having breasts as large as yours. They'd throw off my center of gravity too much.
Huh... now I can't help but wonder if you'd even fit into any of the Zero Suits I've seen.
Hope you didn’t just walk into this with your proverbial pants down… because now you’re about to lose them for real.
You’re not the type to be a sore loser, ~name~ - you can at least be happy about that.
If you’re still a bit nervous, that’s fine; it’d be almost more concerning if you weren’t.
I usually save biology practice for my work life, but… I’d still enjoy taking a closer look at you right now, ~name~.
Don’t worry too much about sticking the landing, ~name~ - this is the easy part.
Don’t shave either, huh? Never understood the stigma against it myself.
Anyone who’d judge you for not shaving isn’t worth your time anyway. Thought you should know.
Don’t get why you’d trim. If you want less hair down there, why not go all the way?
Never tried shaving before… I can’t imagine it’d feel good against tight clothing like mine.
Huh… you really spared no attention in keeping it smooth, didn’t you?
Didn’t really give much thought towards shaving there, myself. If most guys don’t, why should I?
Still don’t get the fuss about shaving. Is it really some kind of fashion thing if most people aren’t going to look there anyway?
Alright... guess it's really getting down to the count for you, huh?
Interesting. Is it entirely self-contained, or are there other planets its people have expanded to?
Mejare, you say? Do you mean its people only reside on a single planet, or have they expanded elsewhere?
I'd hope so. Then again, I'm not always on-point when it comes to judging people... or when they're putting on an act.
Sure I do. That is, assuming I'm right about you. I'm not usually reliant on my people skills, small as they are.
A feline... feral? I assume that's the classification for those with similar traits as yours?
So hybridizations like you are known as "ferals"? And I take it "feline" is only one subclass?
Relax. If you start playing better, my suit won't be here much longer anyway.
Really. So you think just being "hot" is enough, then?
Alright, then if that's not the case... what are you planning to do with it?
Shame. I don't suppose you can tell us why you actually have it here?
I see... and ~player~ is just cool with you having it out here?
Hm. Did ~player~ ask you to bring it or something?
What in the-?!
Sorry, Bobobo, but you know what they say. Play stupid games, win stupid pri-
And this is why you don't use your surprises too early. Otherwise, you end up-
Okay, now you've got to be out of- wait, what?!
So, you're going for your- huh? What's that?
Uh, Sakura? Your skin's starting to look really-
Interesting. In the Federation, VR is mostly used for training programs. At least, that's what I've heard.
Entertainment? I wouldn't have considered that; what little I've heard about VR is how the Federation uses it for training.
Interesting. Typically focusing on such form in an armor's creation results in the loss of some function. Whoever made yours must've really known what they were doing.
Fascinating. Armor designs are typically best when they choose substance over style, but yours is able to have both. Whoever made it must be an expert at the craft.
I've seen hundreds of unique wildlife among all the worlds I've been to, Fischl. If you're asking if any of them have the type of conscious loyalty of your raven, though, the answer's no.
Interesting... I'd imagine the military programs are quite a far cry from the civillian ones.
You don't say... I don't suppose you've had a chance to see the differences between the military and civillian programs, have you?
...And here I thought my first pick was going to be big...
...Do people on this planet usually take off their clothes like that?
Oh. I'm really not sure whether to be disappointed or impressed.
...Well, there goes whatever assumption I had that I was prepared for this place.
This has to break at least a few rules, right? You can't just- oh, never mind.
Huh. So that's a real ghost... and not just an alien masquerading as one.
...Dead. You tricked us this whole time?
That’s you, ~name~. No getting out of it now.
~name~’s out, then. Lucky us.
That makes ~name~ down for the count… don’t think there’s any complaints about that.
Well, uh… good luck, then?
So… have fun, I guess?
Well, I… hope you enjoy this as much as we will, right?
I’ll admit I’ve had a few pervy thoughts in the past about a few of the Federation soldiers… though this is honestly better.
Enjoying yourself there, ~name~?
Try to savor the moment, ~name~. Take it from someone who’s had to make it last with not much else to do out in space.
You’re… looking good? Sorry, this is still kinda new to me… I am enjoying it, really.
Hm… if I was more clever, I’d probably have some good wordplay for this.
Want me to help… somehow? Like, do you want me to stand a certain way or something?
Does every guy like it like that? Interesting…
This is actually… pretty exciting.
Can you let me know when you get close? I want to see...
...Huh. I have to say, I’m impressed.
Well, I won’t lie, that honestly got my mind racing.
You… wouldn’t happen to have more in you after this, would you, ~name~? Just wondering, not promising anything.
Looks like it’s on for you, ~name~. Put your best foot forward, alright?
I think everyone here’s going to enjoy this, ~name~, so… you might as well too.
Don’t feel too bad, ~name~ - the way ~player~ looks at you, I think you’re going to be making ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ real happy tonight.
Or… best finger? Ugh, sorry, I’m not good at metaphors.
Besides, you don’t have to worry about winning anymore. That’s… less to worry about in a sense, right?
And if you’re still feeling shy, well… no way of getting over it like just getting right into it, huh?
I think I’ve tried that technique before myself - being alone in space gives you a lot of time to experiment.
You look really… sexy. Does that sound genuine? Because I mean it.
I’m not very good at dirty talk, but… if it’d help you, I can try.
It’s so… different from seeing someone right in front of me doing it, compared to just erotic pictures.
I don’t think I could stop looking… even if I wanted to.
Those noises you’re making… would you mind making them a bit louder?
Looks like you’re really having fun. That makes two of us, ~name~.
I wonder… what will you look like when you finish?
...Is now a good time to make idle chat? Doesn’t seem like the best moment to talk about cannon calibrating or the like.
Wish I could peer into your mind right now, ~name~ - whatever you’re thinking of, it’s clearly got you going good.
I’ve explored plenty of caverns, but yours… actually no, that doesn’t sound good. Sorry.
You've got to appreciate even small moments of joy... and I do appreciate this.
I wonder... how many other intelligent species partake in self-pleasure like this?
Actually... this place has a few private rooms, right? Just curious.
Maybe it's just the timing, but... you sure look good right now, ~name~.
I'm impressed... maybe I should give that a try, too.
Which of us will finish first? I can't help but wonder...
Rubbing it out next to someone else isn't my first idea of a good time... but this isn't so bad.
Ah... you know, if we get to know each other well enough, maybe next time you could help...
Mhm... It's so different doing this with someone else, rather than in the isolation of my ship...
I... hope I look as good doing this as ~name~ does...
This is all so new to me still. And yet it feels- unf, so right...
This might be going a bit far, but... are you by any chance a squirter, ~name~?
Do- ah, a lot of women do it like that?
I'm glad I've gotten to know you better, ~name~. I'm not exactly eager to- mmm, sit down and do this with just anyone.
Oh, um, you don't have to do that, Nadia. Please.
Jeez, you looked like you could cook a Metroid egg on your face, with how flushed it was.
Damn… I can only imagine how good you felt there.
Do you always finish that hard? Lucky you.
Well now... if that was any indication, I could get used to this place.
Huh... Guess I'm a lot rustier at this than I thought.
Well... someone was going to be first anyway, right? Just kind of hoped it wouldn't be me.
Well, I’m out. Can’t win every mission, right?
Oh well. I like to think I’m so good at my job that life’s gotta get me back by making me suck at games.
Shoot… well, never promised I’d win. Besides, I've grown a bit curious as to how this'll feel here.
Eh, fair’s fair. I may be the best there is, but even the best aren’t good at everything.
Can't believe I've got to do it here... starting to wish I'd brought a towel.
Oh, right... the sand's not going to make this any more pleasant.
By the way, if you're thinking about hiding behind a tree and going "boo" at some point, or anything stupid like that, I'm out. Got it?
Guess the darkness here is kind of like space, in a way... a lot of people consider space scarier, too.
You know, you should feel lucky. Normally my bounties are the ones down on the ground, but I’ll make an exception for you all tonight…
You’ve all done your best to tease me so far anyway; and you’d better keep it up.
Ever wondered how strong your fingers get after years of using a multipurpose arm cannon? Well, time to give you some idea…
I ought to thank you all, too - you were about the perfect crowd to get me comfortable doing this.
Heh, with friends like these… who needs- ah, dirty videos?
Mmm… best night off I’ve had in a while…
Have to say, my head’s feeling clearer than it has in a while…
Hey, mind showing off just a… little more right now?
Oh, this is way better than just my imagination…
That look on your face, ~player~... bet it’d look real cute with you underneath me.
Squirm around in your seat more, ~player~. Thinking about everything running through your head is getting me real hot.
You know, ~player~, if you acted up right now, I’d have a reason to put you in cuffs…
I’m a generous kind of person… which is why I’m giving you all a part in my fantasy right now.
Incredible endurance was just one of the things I got from training with the Chozo… think about that for a moment.
Grappling’s actually one of my strengths in hand-to-hand… you look like you’d be perfect to try that with, ~player~.
Yeah, that’s it… damn, that’s good…
Still so odd being this open around other people… but right now, it’s too late to complain.
Let me just- ah, get a good eyeful of you… there we go.
I don’t know about the rest of you, but- unf, right now I’m having a ball.
Fuck, it’s been so long… this is going to be a be a big one…
Hey- ahhh, mind doing a good pose right now? I’d appreciate it…
This sensation… it’s almost as good as a Crystal Flash…
It’s so different from- ah, doing it alone… in the emptiness of space…
Look at me, ~player~... look at me in the eyes.
Yes, yes, yes--- AHHHHHHHH!
Well... that was surprisingly good, considering I had sand all over my ass the whole time.
Phew... a sandy beach isn't my first choice to do this, but it was better than it had any right to be.
Huh... guess it's not that hard to get in the mood even in a place like this, with the right people.
Hah, alright then... guess even a creepy forest like this can be good enough if the people make up for it.
Hoooh, man… How long was it since I last rubbed one out, anyway?
Hahhh... Yes, I'm a squirter. What of it?
Mind bringing me over a drink, barkeep? Feel like I’m close to exhausting my last E-tank here.
I’d tell you all a good story, but my head’s still a bit fuzzy. A lot of missions are blending together a bit in my head right now.
By the way, I hope you’re keeping my power suit safe safe. As in, don’t let it get dirty either.
Does this place sell any playing card decks? Mine are starting to fall apart.
Think I’ll keep this place a secret from the Federation for now… Fed soldiers tend to be pretty meatheaded.
Do I have another one in me…? Guess it depends on how good the rest of you do.
Glad the scans found no Federation criminals beforehand. I’d be a sitting duck right now.
I’m relieved there’s no one here who’d think about hijacking my ship, by the way. I know that because I haven’t heard any explosions outside.
So… watch anything good lately? I haven’t really been keeping up on shows, or… the like…
(Am I supposed to make conversation now? How?)
(Wonder if they find it easier staying talkative even like this…)
Heh, well look at that. Can you say, “Mission accomplished”?
Well, look who won. Sorry I didn’t get to join you, but I never make it easy for my foes - whether on the job or just goofing off.
Guess I’ll have to come back here again after my next mission. This was one hell of a way to blow off steam.
Well, you sure made me cut it close, didn't you? Kind of makes me want to see if I can do better next time.
That was a bit close for comfort... oh, don't take that the wrong way. I honestly did have fun.
Close victory there... but then again, I don't really mind a challenge as long as it's reasonable.
So, what else is there to do around here? I think I’ve got some more time left before I head off to the closest Federation base.
Got to relax, meet some new friends, and even had a good rub-out with some of them… all in all, not a bad way to spend a day off.
Heh, congratulations to you, ~name~... when’s the next time you’re coming here? I wanna make sure I get you then.
